column1: kathie stanley queen| kathie stanley queen. born: june 26
column3: 2015 watch the tribute queen mrs. kathie stanley queen age 58 of ellijay died friday june 12
column6: ga the daughter of the late lewis and florence mann stanley. she attended gilmer high school
column7: worked for springs industries and was a member of the ellijay church of christ. survivors include: husband: kevin queen
column23: nieces and nephews also survive. funeral services will be held monday at 1:00pm from the chapel of bernhardt funeral home with minister david mullins officiating. interment will be in the stanley church of christ cemetery in fannin county. the family will meet with friends sunday from 2 until 9pm at the funeral home. servicesfuneral service monday
column25: 20151:00 pmbernhardt funeral home 163 river st. ellijay
